resources.string: Kill the Distraction and achieve productivity
Focus fact: The average person is distracted every 40 seconds when working in front of a computer.
Productivity tip: It takes about 23 minutes to fully recover from a distraction.
Focus fact: Multitasking can reduce productivity by up to 40%.
Productivity tip: The most productive 10% of people work in 52-minute intervals with 17-minute breaks.
Focus fact: Reading text-only content increases comprehension by 25% compared to content with images.
